Package fr.iutvalence.info.but.r2_01.labyrinthGame.core

Class LabyrinthGame

java.lang.Object
fr.iutvalence.info.but.r2_01.labyrinthGame.core.LabyrinthGame
public class LabyrinthGame extends Object
Class representing a simulation of "escape labyrinth if you can" game. It consists in spawning a robot AI in a labyrinth, playing turns until robot reaches exit or timeout occurs.

    • loop

      private boolean loop(int maxStepCountAllowed)
      Processes simulation loop (process robot action until exit reached or timeout).
      Parameters:
      maxStepCountAllowed - maximum steps allowed.
      Returns:
      true if exit has been reached, false if timeout occured.
